midPane.h5: Software for the automatic partitioning of gene sequences according to their genetic and ecological similarity.
midPane.div: by Lawrence David and Eric Alm

UPDATE
Run AdaptML online using the new AdaptML online server. Simply upload your tree files and processing takes place on our servers. Does not require code downloading or prior programming knowledge!
SOURCE

Download version 1.0 of AdaptML here.
